quote.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quote.author: Winston Churchill

messages.400: Your request wasn't formatted correctly. This is a stumble, not a fall. Learn from it, adjust your approach, and continue with courage.
messages.401: You need proper credentials to proceed. Not having them yet isn't failure—it's just the next step. Gather what you need and continue forward.
messages.402: This resource requires payment. Whether you proceed or not, the choice is yours. Either path forward takes courage to decide.
messages.403: Access is restricted here. That's not a failure on your part. Sometimes doors are closed. Find another path and continue with determination.
messages.404: You've encountered an obstacle, not a defeat. The page you sought isn't here, but that doesn't stop your journey. What matters is your courage to continue forward.
messages.405: The method you tried didn't work. That's not failure—that's learning. Try a different approach and continue with renewed wisdom.
messages.406: The format isn't compatible. This isn't defeat, just information. Adjust your approach and continue forward with what you've learned.
messages.408: The request timed out. You're not too slow; sometimes conditions aren't right. Take what you've learned and continue trying.
messages.409: There's a conflict to resolve. Conflicts aren't failures—they're opportunities to find better solutions. Resolve it and continue.
messages.410: What you sought is permanently gone. This isn't your failure. Acceptance takes courage. Find a new goal and continue your journey.
messages.413: The payload was too large. This isn't defeat—it's feedback. Adjust, optimize, and continue forward with what you've learned.
messages.429: You've made too many attempts. That shows determination, not failure. Rest, regroup, and continue when ready.
messages.500: The server encountered an error. This isn't your failure. Our team is working on it. Your courage is to wait patiently and continue when ready.
messages.502: The gateway connection failed. Technical issues aren't your defeat. These things happen. Continue trying with patience.
messages.503: The service is temporarily unavailable. Downtime isn't failure—it's a pause. Continue checking back with determination.
messages.504: The gateway timed out. Network issues aren't your fault. Keep your courage and continue trying when conditions improve.
messages.default: You've encountered an obstacle, not a defeat. What matters is your courage to continue forward.

footers.401: Gather what you need and proceed
footers.404: The courage to continue is what defines us
footers.408: Timing is part of the journey
footers.409: Resolution is a form of progress
footers.default: The courage to continue is what defines us
